content: I work with Angular and RxJS to create Front-end applications. I additionally have limited experience with React and Redux, putting the focus on Angular. For styling, I use SCSS. I know vanilla javascript and typescript, often using Greensocks and ScrollReveal libraries for the animation.
I use Python with Django/Flask libraries. I create REST applications as well as server-rendered web pages. I use PostgresSQL as a database of choice and use MySQL as alternative
I can create compelling, easy to navigate and good looking experiences. I know design fundamentals I am gaining more experience creating for the users becoming more proficient with Design
